short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension that improves Sitecore XM Cloud user experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sitecore XM Cloud Extensions is a browser extension that improves Sitecore XM Cloud user experience.

It is a work in progress with only one feature for the moment.

Features:
- Connecting XM Cloud Pages to your local XM Cloud instance.

GitHub repository: https://github.com/jflheureux/Sitecore-XM-Cloud-Extensions

Author: Jeff L'Heureux ( https://www.jflh.ca/aboutme )
